name: home-helper
description: Home Helper app with Vercel serverless backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run install-all && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev:local to start development servers.'

author: You
